post.text: Join me at the City of Flint Water Plant for a couple of minutes.

comment.author: Exixia
comment.text: If being an honest hard working American is Deplorable, "then deal me in".

replies.author: Lacey
replies.text: She was talking about racists, bigots, homophobes, etc. if your are not one then she wasn't talking to you.

replies.author: Exixia
replies.text: Lacey she is a bigot taking advantage of minority's only for their votes. She is just trying to brainwash people into thinking what she said was true but it is not. Trump supporters just want America safe and great again! She has no business saying what she did.

replies.author: Kaitlyn
replies.text: ADIOS LAURIE WARD D B Operation Trump 2016
